LETTER OF OFFER TO SELL PLOT NUMBER {{doc.unit_no}} MEASURING AN EIGHTH ACRE EXCISED FROM BLOCK NUMBERS A38, A39, A40, A 41 AND A42, ALL FORMING PART OF LAND REFERENCE NUMBER 11295”).

We are in the process of completing the purchase of block numbers A38, A39, A40, A41 and A42 (``the property’’) from National Cooperative Housing Union Limited (NACHU) of P.O Box 51693-00200 Nairobi (``the transaction’’) and sub-dividing the property into various Plots.

In this regard we are pleased to offer to you the subject plot in the property, subject to contract by way of a formal Agreement for Sale to be prepared by the our Advocates upon payment of the full deposit amount and based on the following terms and conditions:

Bank : CFC STANBIC BANK KENYA

Swift Code: SBICKENX


8.
State of the Plot
The Vendor has afforded you the opportunity to inspect the plot and are satisfied as to its state and condition.

9.
Completion Date
It is envisioned that the sale and purchase of the Plot shall be completed within Seven (7) days of the execution of the Agreement for Sale.

10.
Failure to Complete
In the event that the Purchaser shall not be able to complete this transaction after the signing of the Agreement for Sale, then it is agreed by and between the parties hereto that the Vendor will be entitled to withhold as liquidated damages ten percent (10%) of the Purchase Price and well as legal fees of our Advocates and any other costs incidental to the preparation of this Letter of Offer, Agreement for Sale and any other documents incidental to this transaction in which case the said Agreement will be deemed to have terminated and neither party shall then have a claim against the other

11.
Legal fees , Disbursement costs and Expenses
All documents relating to this transaction shall be prepared by our Advocates and the Purchaser shall cater for the legal fees, disbursement costs and government charges which shall be payable upon signing the Agreement for Sale as follows:
